Description:
The Raven - Legacy of a Master Thief - is a fascinating adventure of a criminal length of three episodes from the creators of the unforgettable The Book of Unwritten Tales. Full of unexpected twists and turns, this quest will immerse the player in a complicated story, which absorbed all the best features of detective novels.
Paris, 1960-th year. The mysterious thief nicknamed Raven keeps the tension throughout Europe. He manages to carry out the most unimaginable crimes remain unpunished. But on such a skilful and resourceful villain is a hunter. The young detective Nicolas Legrand managed to catch a crow and put him in jail.
Four years after these events, the life of London's shocking grand theft. From the museum lost ruby "Eye Sphinx." At the crime scene detectives find a pen (a symbol of left and Raven). Is it possible that there was a follower of the legendary thief? Now, the investigation will have to answer this question.
At the same time the bell rings in Zurich. Constable Jacob Zellner sneaking through the mountains to the phone market. He does not even know what is in the bank vault, located just a few hundred meters from the police station. When he picks up his life big changes ...
